summary: This mod replaces the ugly wooden male mannequin with a female stone looking sculpture.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]
Description[/size][size=4]:[/size][/b][size=4]
[/size]
I really liked XunAmarox's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26266/?]Sculpture Statue Mannequins[/url] mod and the idea behind it, but I wasn't happy with the overall looking of it. That was the reason that I made the whole mod from scratch and gave it my own touch. I know that both mods looking quite similar but I used completely different assets for the creation. You will see the difference ingame or in the mod itself.
The body for the sculptures was creaded in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url] and is CBBE based. If you like the curves, you can download the body separately [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66579/?]here[/url]. If not, you can replace the body easily with your own body mod.

English isn't my first language but I tried to write proper and understandable but if you still find spelling mistakes, feel free to contact me for a better description.

If you like the mod, I would be glad if you endorse it. If you want you can also upload a few pics, it would be much apreciated. :)[size=2][color=#f4f4f4]

[/color][/size]
[b][size=4]Requirement:[/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=2]Hearthfire[/size]
[/list][size=3][b]
[size=2]Optional[/size][/b][/size][size=2]:
[/size]
[list]
[*][size=2]a CBBE compatible body[/size]
[/list][size=4][b]

Installation:[/b]
[/size]
[u]Manual[/u] - Simply download the file and extract everything into your Data folder.

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Download the file to NMM and install it like you would any other mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Download the file to MO and install it like you would any other mod.
Or download the archive manually and open the zip via MO and install.


[size=4][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]

[u]Manual[/u] - Simple remove the CherosSculptures.esp, the meshes/Sculptures folder and the textures/Sculptures folder,

remove in meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\Skyrim.esm

==> 00089A85

in textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\Skyrim.esm

==> 00089A85
==> 00089A85.tga

and in textures\Actors\Character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\HearthFires.esm

==> 00008B32.tga
==> 00015D5D.tga

[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.

[u]Mod Organizer[/u] - Just deactivate the mod.


[size=4][b]Version:[/b][/size]

1.0 Initial release


[size=4][b]Known Issues:[/b][/size]

[list]
[*][size=2][size=2]Has a small seem on the neck. I wasn't able to fix it cuz body and face have two different resolutions and the noise on both maps made the bad effect. I had to use a much stronger noise effect for the face texture as for the body to match but the downside was the seem :([/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][b]

Credits:[/b][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/481348]Sunspot2[/url] - for the hands
"The unknown user" - for the skin textures (where on earth are you?)
Bethesda - for Skyrim and the possibility to give it our own touch
And all I have forgotten
[size=4][b]

Permission:[/b][/size]

If you have any questions feel free to contact me.
